description: En Translations for 'MSF Mental Health - mhGAP Baseline'

translations.Presenting history / evolution of sympto: Presenting history / evolution of symptoms (current symptoms onset duration course intensity triggers associated symptoms)
translations.Past psychiatric history (past diagnoses: Past psychiatric history (past diagnoses past substance use number of episodes duration treatment side-effects)
translations.Patient already on psychotropic / psychi: Patient already on psychotropic / psychiatric medication (not prescribed by MSF)
translations.Medication and dosage - Please check in: Medication and dosage - Please check in Medications (update it if necessary)
translations.Additional information about previous tr: Additional information about previous treatment (including side effects)
translations.Basic mental status examination (appeara: Basic mental status examination (appearance orientation speech / motor activity mood / affect thought / perception cognitive)
translations.Clinical diagnosis (only to be establish: Clinical diagnosis (only to be established by mhGAP clinician)
translations.Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
translations.Trouble falling or staying asleep or sle: Trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much
translations.Feeling tired or having little energy: Feeling tired or having little energy
translations.Feeling bad about yourself - or that you: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
translations.Trouble concentrating on things such as: Trouble concentrating on things such as reading the newspaper or watching television
translations.Moving or speaking so slowly that other: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
translations.Thoughts that you would be better off de: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
translations.CGI-S (rating of severity CGI-S how ment: CGI-S (rating of severity CGI-S how mentally ill is the patient at this time)
translations.Next appointment date (required if Follo: Next appointment date (required if Follow-up required is Yes)
